title: Perpetually In Game
body: I finished a game, got the "victory" screen, went to go to the postgame and got the message "The server says you're in a game, please restart the client." I did so, and what do you know? Still in-game. Can't reconnect, but stuck at the reconnect screen. Can anyone help with this issue?

replies.body: Seen a few other posts on this around the same time, looks like a ghost game which is a result of your client never receiving the message telling it that the game's over.  Should last for a maximum of 2 hours, but if you see it for longer (or keep getting ghost games) please let me know!
